categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Skatheris was a male Sith Lord of the Sith Empire during the Cold War with the Galactic Republic. Skatheris began studying the creatures known as k'lor'slugs on their native planet Noe'ha'on, in hopes of eliminating the k'lor'slug infestation on the planet Korriban. With the help of other bioanalysts, Skatheris developed a prototype anti-k'lorl'slug serum.

Skatheris was first mentioned in the Bioanalysis crew skill mission "The K'lor'slug Expedition" in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic. With Game Update 4.1, the mission was made available to both factions, and Skatheris was referred to as faction-ambiguous "Professor Skatheris."
